messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] sewing was: school hours...sort of
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 09/15/2000 2:30:01 AM !!!First Boot!!!, braunville@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 09/15/2000 2:30:01 AM !!!First Boot!!!, braunville@...
writes:

<< (I
got into soooo much trouble for that. My mom's not as creative as I am.
Scarred me for life. I vowed that if my kids needed a box of Kleenex to
play
with, I'd give it to them! LOL)
>>


You rebel you!

FYI, my kids are HIGHLY supervised while using the sewing machine. I may be
brave but I'm not stupid. Goodness knows what those curtains would have
looked like!

Your son's robe sounds wonderful. Ambitious but great. I don't think I
would tackle such a hard project myself -- knit cuffs, aaauuuggghhhh! I'm
sure he'll do great tho! I'll stick with cotton curtains!

Nance
